data.title: Larry Niven, Jerry Pournelle
data.meta_description: New York: Ballantine Books 1985 , 1985. First edition. Hardcover. 8vo. 12 , xiii-xxiii, 5 , 3-495, 7 pp. Quarter blue cloth over blue paper boards with silver lettering on the spine. Price of 17.95 on front flap of dust jacket. Decorated endpapers and pastedowns. Near Fine / very near Fine. Item #00003498 A small concavity to the spine; jacket is close to Fine.
